This is ssedit reference script to category helper.

Layout (tree):
SSEEDIT_locations/
  Armor/
    FWChildArmor.psc
  Dialog Topic/
    01ACBB - BF_ChildDialogeTopic/
      FW_ChildDialInventory.psc
      FW_ChildDialInventory2.psc
